verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa rahitha deva kumaaraa shaapa vaahakaa Shaapa vaahakaa nitya kopa rahithudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pari poorna devudaa naraavathaarudaa Naraavatharudaa maa yesu naadhudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dayaamayunda kristu yesu daakshinya prabhuvaa Daakshinya prabhuvaa baahulya devudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nammadagina loka rakshakaa sarvopakaarudaa Sarvopikaarudaa sarva shakhti manthudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saatvikundaa sarva janula kaankshaneeyudaa Kanksha neeyudaa vaatsalya devudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rikhtudai thagginchu konina vinaya poornudaa Vinaya poornudaa mamu gaachu devudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satyavanthudavu maadunitya devudaa Nitya devudaa maa manchi bodhakudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarva loka shrusti kartha satya devudaa Satya devudaa maa nitya jeevamaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ellarilo shrestudaa maa vallabhundavu Vallabhundavu Halleluya paadedam{/lang-eng}
